title: Dominion Gamemode
body:
Guys, I've always wondered about this. For those still playing that used to play ont he US server before the Oceanic server came about, we had this wonderful little gamemode, that I loved, called Dominion.

There was a Matchmaking queue for it, Now, I ask rito this, why isn't there a Matchmaking Queue for Dominion?

replies.body: Yes please hurry up and get this queue running I want to play Dominion

Not enough players on the oceanic server that would play that map and have a healthy matchmaking. 
Even on NA it takes a while to find people to play on that map, it is a novelty that quickly wears off.

Thats odd, because when I was on the NA server, along with everyone else, you get games pretty quickly, maybe most the players, who were on the NA server, moved to OCE when the OCE server was established

Maybe... haha
Also, it has been a year since OCE became a thing, and dominion has been out since 2011. People are probably getting bored of it already.

Yes, yes, all my YES.

Dominion please Riot.

It's about time.

Or at least give us Normal Draft, one of those.
